A C M P R W 

R

readValueOfCoils(byte, int, int, int) - Static method in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Read coils values (Modbus function code: 1) For example to read value of 3 coils starting from coil 2 in device with address 10 in RTU format write: readValueOfCoils(10, 2, 3, MODBUS_TYPE_RTU);
readValueOfHoldingRegisters(byte, int, int, int) - Static method in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Read values of holding registers (Modbus function code: 3) Note that holding register address is passed with offset of 40001 - so to point to holding register 40003 you need to point to address 40003-40001=2 To point to 40001 address you need to point to 0 address (zero offset).
readValueOfInputRegisters(byte, int, int, int) - Static method in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Read values of input registers (Modbus function code: 4) Note that input register address is passed with offset of 30001 - so to point to register 30003 you need to point to address 30003-30001=2 To point to 30001 address you need to point to 0 address (zero offset).
readValueOfInputs(byte, int, int, int) - Static method in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Read inputs values (Modbus function code: 2) Note that input address is passed with offset of 10001 - so to point to input 10003 you need to point to address 10003-10001=2 To point to 10001 address you need to point to 0 address (zero offset).
RESPONSE_Acknowledge - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Slave has accepted request and is processing it, but a long duration of time is required.
RESPONSE_CRC_ERROR - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
CRC in reply was faulty - probably data was broken on the way
RESPONSE_Gateway_Path_Unavailable - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Specialized for Modbus gateways.
RESPONSE_Gateway_Target_Device_Failed_to_Respond - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Specialized for Modbus gateways.
RESPONSE_Illegal_Data_Address - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Data address of some or all the required entities are not allowed or do not exist in slave
RESPONSE_Illegal_Data_Value - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Value is not accepted by slave
RESPONSE_Illegal_Function - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Function code received in the query is not recognized or allowed by slave
RESPONSE_Memory_Parity_Error - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Slave detected a parity error in memory.
RESPONSE_Negative_Acknowledge - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Slave cannot perform the programming functions.
RESPONSE_NO_DATA - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Reply don't have data at all or data in insufficient
RESPONSE_Slave_Device_Busy - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Slave is engaged in processing a long-duration command.
RESPONSE_Slave_Device_Failure - Static variable in class polylogic.org.protocols.ModBus.ModBus
Unrecoverable error occurred while slave was attempting to perform requested action
